page.title: 03THE LEISURE CENTRE
page.content: The building was built in 1971. 21 people work there and all enjoy it. In the sports hall there are many activities, eg. unihock (indoor hockey),circuit training, badminton, karate and pop mobility (keep-fit). In the Victoria Hall (the old part of the leisure centre) different activities are held, weddings,theatre productions exhibitions,fashion shows, dog shows. Each week an average of 1500 people go to the leisure centre. Some go once a week, some alternate days, some every day. The user age group varies from 8-70+. Improvements have been made with squash courts added. Ideas for the future include: better showering facilities, more viewing areas, a creche for babies, facilities for the disabled, and possibly a swimming pool.
